articles.title: Call of Duty Devs Finally Comment on Skill-Based Matchmaking Issues - IGN
articles.description: The Call of Duty team has finally acknowledged the issues surrounding Skill-Based Matchmaking, promising to make it part of "ongoing discussions with the community."
